values.description:
Rain Concert Technologies (P) Ltd, is a leading provider of Web-Mobile-Electronics convergent solutions and has capabilities that span across various domains, applications and technologies. Very strong Web-Mobile convergent solutions are at its best with Rain Concert.
Our spectrum of  solutions range from  High End Web Application Development, Rich Internet Applications, iphone/ipad Applications, e-Governance solutions, Social Networking Applications, Online Learning Management Systems, Web Casting Applications, Web Based CRM & ERP Solutions, Collaborative Video Sharing Platforms, e-Commerce Applications, Online Auction & e-Commerce Portals,  to development of Games for Web & Mobile, Enterprise domain solutions. 
The company has a Regional Office in Delhi and has set up offices in Saudi, Dubai and soon to launch its office in Bahrain and has strategic partners in USA, Bahrain and UAE. Aarthika Technologies, the subsidiary of Rain Concert has a strong presence in the online sales platform and continues to maintain its position as a Top Rated Company.

values.description:
EcommIT Labs provides custom software application development services to its clients from its offshore center in India. values.description:
About Horizon Technology Partners

For over fifteen years, the team at Horizon has built a reputation and solid record of excellence. Horizon Technology Partners currently enjoys the position of Preferred Vendor for many predominant companies. We count among our firm's greatest assets, our professional/personal relationships with the senior management of these companies, many of which go back to our very beginning; and we remain committed to the professional standards, quality, attentiveness, thoroughness, and just plain bottom-line value that we believe has contributed to our reputation and these long-term relationships.

- Strategic IT Consulting   
- Staff Augmentation

- eCommerce / Intranet Solutions   
- Software / Application Development

h3 Technologies, LLC (a Florence, Kentucky based and international company) is an information technologies (IT) staffing and software development company. h3 has off shore branch in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India. We have expertise in Oracle Apps and java related all technologies but we can help for SAP, .Net, PHP  and other technologies as well. We provide online, visual and live training for core java, advanced java (spring, hibernate, web services and SOA), manual and automated testing, business analyst and android programming but we can arrange training for .net and php as well.

values.description:
Les métiers de BK Consulting : 
- Salle de marché (Front/Middle/Back Office) 
- Asset Management 
- Administration de fonds 
- R&D (pricers) 

Nous sommes présents sur Paris et l'international (Luxembourg, Bruxelles...) et intervenons notamment auprès de BNP Paribas, Société Générale, CaLyon, Natixis, CDC, Banque de France… 

Au niveau technologie, nous sommes fortement sollicités sur : 
- Java et les architectures J2EE (JSP, Servlet, EJB, JMS, JDBC…) AWT, Swing, SWT sur serveurs d’applications Weblo, Websphere et/ou frameworks : Struts, Hibernate, Spring… 
- C++ (sous Unix et/ou Windows) sur les librairies MFC, STL, COM/DCOM… 
- .NET (VB.NET, C#...), Winforms et/ou Webforms 
- Sybase (Transact SQL) et/ou Oracle (PL/SQL) et/ou SQL Server (Transact SQL) : Maîtrise du requêtage SQL, des procédures stockées, des triggers, vues... 
- L4G : Developper2000 et/ou Delphi et/ou 4D et/ou VB et/ou PB 

Par ailleurs, il est vrai que nous attachons une certaine importance à la connaissance d’UML et des Design Patterns. 

Nous travaillons également en administration système notamment sous : 
- Unix (Solaris, AIX, HP-UX…), maîtrise des scripts shell… 

Nous sommes également sollicités sur de la MOA : 
- Expression des besoins 
- Rédaction du cahier des charges 
- Rédaction des spécifications fonctionnelles 
- Mise en œuvre de la recette, homologation, testing 
- Paramétrage et/ou extension de progiciel financier (Summit, Infinity, Diagram, Reuters, Kondor+, Sophis, Panorama…)
values.name: BK CONSULTING
